name: Crapshot Saloon
description:
"Hey, partner! That feller over there just called you ugly! Are ye gonna take that sittin' down, or are ye gonna show that no-good, spit-drinkin', donkey-brained knuckledragger what's for? Grab yer dice and throw down, because here in Crapshot Saloon we don't take craps from nobody!"

In Crapshot Saloon, your dice are your weapon as you face off against 6 unique criminals of extraordinary grit. Punch, drink, and shoot your way to victory using Yahtzee-inspired gameplay. Choose your dice carefully or find yourself staring into the barrel of a desperado's gun. On this side of the desert, life and death are but rolls of the dice.
